Default Value: "Text"

Default Value: "ToolTip"

summary.para: Lists values that specify the type of the ribbon navigation element used by the control.

The value is determined automatically, based on the type of the end-user's device: touch or non-touch. Corresponds to Ribbon under non-touch device browsers. Corresponds to OneLineRibbon under touch device browsers.
An external ribbon is used by the Spreadsheet as a toolbar.
The Spreadsheet has no toolbars.
The built-in ribbon displays all items in an active tab on one line.
The toolbar for the Spreadsheet is rendered as a built-in ribbon.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.ActiveTabIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the active ribbon tab within the ASPxSpreadsheet control.

member.value: A string value specifying the ribbon ID.

summary.para: Fires when a round trip to the server has been initiated either manually (by a call to the client method) or automatically by the ASPxSpreadsheet (an internal service callback).

summary.para: Gets or sets the ASPxSpreadsheet's client programmatic identifier.

summary.para: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the ASPxSpreadsheet.

member.value: A object which allows assigning handlers to the client-side events available to the ASPxSpreadsheet.

summary.para: Closes the workbook currently loaded into ASPxSpreadsheet and accessed via the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.ConfirmOnLosingChanges

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the confirmation message that is displayed when any unsaved data changes are going to be lost.

member.value: A string specifying the confirmation message text.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.CreateDefaultRibbonTabs(System.Boolean)

summary.para: Creates a collection of default Ribbon tabs, specifying what to do with tabs that already exist within the collection.

member.param: true to delete existing tabs; false to add the default tabs to the collection.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.Document

summary.para: Provides access to a workbook loaded in the control.

member.value: A interface specifying a document loaded in the control.

summary.para: Fires when a round trip to the server has been initiated by the loaded document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.DocumentId

summary.para: Gets or sets the document's unique identifier.

member.value: A string value that uniquely identifies the document.

summary.para: Fires when a cloud provider used in the Document Selector sends a request to a cloud service.
Fires before a file is uploaded to the Document Selector and allows you to cancel the action.
Fires on the server side before a folder is created within the FileManager embedded into built-in dialogs, and allows you to cancel the action.
Fires before an item is copied within the Document Selector, and allows you to cancel the action.
Fires before an item is deleted within the FileManager embedded into built-in dialogs, and allows you to cancel the action.
Fires before an item is moved within the FileManager embedded into built-in dialogs, and allows you to cancel the action.
Fires before an item is renamed within the FileManager embedded into built-in dialogs, and allows you to cancel the action.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxSpreadsheet.ASPxSpreadsheet.EnableClientSideAPI

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the ASPxSpreadsheet can be manipulated on the client side in code.

member.value: true, if the control's client object model is fully available; false if no programmatic interface is available for the ASPxSpreadsheet on the client side.

summary.para: This property is not in effect for this class. It is overridden only for the purpose of preventing it from appearing in Microsoft Visual Studio designer tools.
